## LayoutNode interface

Layout node for stacking views vertically or horizontally.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface LayoutNode 
```

## Remarks

Layout nodes arrange child views in either a vertical stack ([vstack()](./dsl.vstack.md)<!-- -->) or horizontal stack ([hstack()](./dsl.hstack.md)<!-- -->). Children are rendered with optional spacing between them.

## Example


```typescript
vstack(
  text('Line 1'),
  text('Line 2')
)

hstack(
  text('Left'),
  text('Right')
)
```
